Class FTreeTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public class FTreeTable
extends FTree
    Combination of Tree and Table Tree -> has node - children structure Table -> sorting, attributes per node
    Author:
    tobias

      • setStdSortAsc

        public void setStdSortAsc(java.lang.Boolean stdSortAsc)
        Sets the Initial Sort order to be ascending/descending

        sorting order
        true - ascending, sortasc, aufsteigend a-z, 0-9
        false - descending, sortdesc, absteigend z-a, 9-0
        null - unsorted, unsorted

        Parameters:
        stdSortAsc - - standard sort is ascending default is true
